item.title: Diamond Jim's Nevada Club Casino: A Flashy Slice of Vintage Las Vegas History
item.description:
A Short, Bright Life on Fremont Street

Diamond Jim’s Nevada Club Casino, a name synonymous with the electric energy of mid-century Las Vegas, occupied a small but significant space at 109 Fremont Street. While its existence was relatively brief, the club left an undeniable mark on the evolution of downtown Las Vegas and the burgeoning “Glitter Gulch” era. Today, the site is part of the Golden Nugget, but the memories of Diamond Jim’s remain vibrant, fueled by nostalgic collectors and historians.
